document.heading: Youth Council of the District of Columbia Establishment Act of 2008

history.narrative: Law 17-251, the “Youth Council of the District of Columbia Establishment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-582 which was referred to the Committee on the Whole. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on July 1, 2008, and July 15, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on August 4, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-498 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-251 became effective on October 22, 2008.
